SEO_DESCRIPTION: Start with our IQ test, then come back daily for fast, fun brain training that strengthens logic, memory, and reaction time.
title: HELLO EN

SUPPORT.TITLE: Customer Support
SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: Our 5-star world-class support team is standing by 24/7 to answer your calls and emails. Average email response time: 5 hours.

DISCLAINER.TITLE: Disclaimer
DISCLAINER.DESCRIPTION: Brainwiki does not provide consumer reports, private investigator services, credit reports, or investigative reports, and is not a consumer reporting agency under the Fair Credit Reporting Act. You may not use our service to make decisions about employment, tenant screening, admission, consumer credit, insurance, or any other purpose that would require an entity operating under FCRA.

HERO.TITLE: Train Your Brain
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Start with our IQ test, then come back daily for fast, fun brain training that strengthens logic, memory, and reaction time.

INFO.HEADING: Daily Brain Training Backed by Cognitive Science

SECTION.TITLE: Train Your Logic
SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Challenge your reasoning skills with fast-paced logic puzzles that improve critical thinking and problem-solving.

SECTION.TITLE: Boost Your Memory
SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Strengthen your short-term and working memory with exercises that help you retain and recall information more efficiently.

SECTION.TITLE: Sharpen Your Reactions
SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Improve your cognitive speed with reaction-time drills designed to test and enhance your attention, coordination, and reflexes.

BLOKS.TITLE: Our Mission
BLOKS.DESCRIPTION: At Brainwiki, our mission is to make brain training and testing accessible to everyone.
